snippet.title: TwinStick: This Aint No Picnic Trailer - XBOX LIVE INDIE GAME
snippet.description: TwinStick:  This Aint No Picnic an Xbox Live Indie Game now on Xbox Live.  The game has 3 modes: EASYTWIN (classic twinstick shooter), HURTTWIN (twinstick shooter with a defend and rescue twist), TRUETWIN (two characters on screen at once with each controlled independently with the analog sticks).  True twin stick action like never before.  Game created by Broke Trophy Games - www.broketrophy.com - Please LIKE TwinStick: This Aint No Picnic on FACEBOOK.
